ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the subcategory of the study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the study treatment subcategory, if not pre-printed on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EXSCAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology. This would most commonly be pre-printed on the CRF or screen and pre-populated in the data management system. This is not typically a question to which the site would provide an answer. EXSCAT can only be used if there is an EXCAT and it must be a subcategorization of EXCAT.
